name: Purgetory
description:
This is a PS1-style horror game where you are in a town filled with ghosts in a night.

Objective: Find and collect the mask and return home with it!

Controls (Keyboard and Mouse)

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left shift - Run
  • Mouse - Look
  • Esc - Quit game (only works during gameplay session)

Controls (Gamepad)

  • Left stick - Movement
  • Right stick - Look
  • Left shoulder - Run
